name: Oath (asyzruffz)
description:
Taking oath during the wedding ceremony is an action when a man and a woman make a vow. But what happens when he broke it? The man must fight all the monsters in the space inside his mind in order to find his wife.


Controls:
- WASD to move
- Space to jump
- Left-click to attack
- Right-click to defend
